data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Food and Kitchenware Hard Pack
data.detailed_description:
This software includes tilemaps and item icons of grocery and cooking utensils with some animation materials to develop your game further.
Please leverage these materials for making cooking elements in various genres!

---------------------------------
Material files
characters x 1 sheet
system x 3 sheets
tilesets x 2 sheets x 2 types
---------------------------------
